property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an encounter card with surge is revealed, either ready Lanwyn or give her +2 Ò until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Spend 1 Î resource to look at a facedown shadow card dealt to an engaged enemy. If that card has a shadow effect, Eldahir gets +2 Ú until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this action. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Resource Action: Exhaust a Noble hero you control to add 2 resources to that hero’s resource pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Master Ironsmith from your hand, if you paid all of its resource cost from a single hero’s resource pool, attach a Weapon or Armor attachment from your hand or discard pile to that hero without paying its resource cost.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Warrior character. Raiment of War counts as 2 Restricted attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 Û, +1 Ú, and +2 hit points.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Sam Gamgee by 2 if you control Frodo Baggins. Response: After a player raises his threat, that player may spend 1 Ê resource to ready Sam Gamgee. He gets +1 Ò, +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only after the staging step.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Choose X questing Hobbit characters you control. Ready each chosen character and remove them from the quest. Then, reduce your threat by X.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Response: After Mirkwood Explorer quests successfully, place 1 progress on it.
Action: Exhaust Mirkwood Explorer to move all progress from it to a location in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a Ranger or Scout character to give attached location -2 $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Build the encounter deck using only The Stormcaller and Corsair Raiders encounter sets, setting The Thing in the Depths and The Stormcaller Elite encounter sets aside, out of play (enemy side faceup). Search the encounter deck for Helm of the Stormcaller and 1 copy of Umbar Raider, and add them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah gain indestructible. Forced: At the end of the round, if Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah are not in play, add 1 resource to each of them. Progress cannot be placed on this stage unless Helm of the Stormcaller is in the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Flip Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah to their objective sides, removing all tokens from them. Search the encounter deck, discard pile and all play areas for each encounter card from the Corsair Raiders encounter set and remove each of those cards from the game. Add The Thing in the Depths to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the set aside The Thing in the Depths encounter set into the encounter deck. Advance to stage 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until X Tentacle enemies are discarded, where X is 1 more than the number of players in the game. Resolve the Grapple keyword on each of those enemies.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the travel phase, the players may travel to a location in the staging area even if another location is currently active. If they do, return the currently active location to the staging area. At the end of the round, if the total $ of any one Ship location is 9 or higher, the Stormcaller is destroyed, and the players lose the game. When Thing in the Depths is destroyed, the players win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Helm of the Stormcaller gets +1 quest point for each resource token on a Raider enemy in play. Forced: When Helm of the Stormcaller becomes the active location, add Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah to the staging area from out of play (enemy side faceup).

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After you travel to Forecastle Deck, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Weather Deck is in the staging area, each other Deck location in play gains "Travel: Each player must exhaust a character he controls to travel here."

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Cargo Hold is the active location, each enemy gets +1 Ú.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Until the end of the phase, attacking enemy gets +2 Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Add 1 resource to each Raider card in play to travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Quarter Deck is the active location, deal each enemy an additional shadow card at the beginning of the combat phase.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Exhaust each character with 1 or less Ú.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the defending character has 0 Ú, discard it. Otherwise, the defending character gets -2 Ú for this attack.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Cannot be engaged.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Thing in the Depths gets +3 hit points per player. Forced: When a Creature enemy is destroyed, deal damage to The Thing in the Depths equal to that enemy’s $.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Surge. Eye of the Beast cannot attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Eye of the Beast is engaged with a player, The Thing in the Depths attacks that player during the combat phase (deal and resolve a shadow card for this attack).

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if Thrashing Arm is engaged with you, deal 3 damage to a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Crushing Arm is detached from a location, it makes an immediate attack against the first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Grasping Arm attacks, the engaged player must exhaust a character he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, resolve Grasping Arm’s Grapple keyword.

property.name: Text
property.value: Giant Arm gets +2 Û when attacking allies.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack, either put Giant Arm into play engaged with you and deal it a shadow card, or resolve its Grapple ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Resolve the Grapple keyword on each enemy discarded by this effect.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Assign damage among characters you control equal to the number of enemies grappled with locations in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The Thing in the Depths attacks each player in turn order from the staging area (deal and resolve a shadow card for each attack).

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack, The Thing in the Depths makes an attack against the defending player (deal a shadow card for this attack).
